lore.min:
&7[Lvl 1] &5Spirit
&8Combat Pet

&7Speed: &a+0.3
&7Intelligence: &a+1

&6Spirit Assistance
&7&7Spawns and assists you when you
&7are a ghost in Dungeons.

&6Spirit Cooldowns
&7&7Reduces the cooldown of your ghost
&7abilities in dungeons by &a5.5%&7.

&7&8This pet's perks are active even
&8when the pet is not summoned!


&eRight-click to add this pet to your 
&epet menu!

&5&lEPIC&r
